mapper.insert: insert into festival_detail (fno, fname, fbg, faddress, ftel, fhomepage, fcontent, fimg1, fimg2, fimg3, fimg4, fimg5) values ( #{fno}, #{fname}, #{fbg}, #{faddress}, #{ftel}, #{fhomepage}, #{fcontent}, #{fimg1}, #{fimg2}, #{fimg3}, #{fimg4}, #{fimg5})
mapper.select: select fno from festival_detail where fno=#{fno}
